displayName.description: The display name for the user. Required.

emailAddress.description: The email address for the user. Required.

key.description: The key for the user. Read-only. This property has been deprecated due to privacy changes.See the migration guide for details.

name.description: The username for the user. This property has been deprecated due to privacy changes. See the migration guide for details.

notification.description: Sends the user an email confirmation that they have been added to Jira. Default is false.

password.description: A password for the user. If a password is not set, a random password is generated.
